metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7330 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3,allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code via a vulnerable'show' parameter value in the view frame (frame.php) because properfiltration is omitted.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7330` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.36.32+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.36.32+dfsg1-1').
